sequenceDiagram autonumber actor User as üë§ Utilisateur participant WC as Web Client participant CN as Core NGINX
:80 participant Voyage as Voyage Service
:3003 participant Payment as Payment Service

:6379 participant Kafka as Kafka
:9092 participant Stripe as üí≥ Stripe API rect rgb(Infra_WorkerNode) Note over User,Voyage: Phase 1: S√©lection Vol User->>WC: S√©lectionne vol
(Infra_EtcdCluster) WC->>WC: Add to cart
(Infra_LoadBalancer) User->>WC: Click "R√©server" WC->>CN: POST /api/v1/bookings
{Infra_EtcdCluster}
Authorization: Bearer JWT CN->>CN: Validate JWT (Infra_EtcdCluster) CN->>Voyage: Forward to Voyage
localhost:3003/bookings end rect rgb(Infra_IngressController) Note over Voyage,Kafka: Phase 2: Cr√©ation R√©servation Voyage->>Voyage: Extract userId from JWT Voyage->>PG: BEGIN transaction Note right of PG: üîÑ ACID transaction
pour coh√©rence Voyage->>PG: INSERT booking
{Infra_LoadBalancer} PG-->>Voyage: Booking created (Infra_IngressController) Voyage->>Redis: Store booking temp
key: "booking:temp:bookingId"
TTL: 15min Note right of Redis: ‚è±Ô∏è Timeout si paiement
√©choue apr√®s 15min Voyage->>Kafka: Publish event
Topic: "voyage.booking.created"

- Decoupling services
- Async processing
- Audit trail Voyage-->>CN: 201 Created
{Infra_LoadBalancer} CN-->>WC: 201 Created end rect rgb(Infra_IngressController) Note over WC,Stripe: Phase 3: Demande Paiement WC->>CN: POST /api/v1/payments/intent
{Infra_RedisCache}
Authorization: Bearer JWT CN->>Payment: Forward to Payment
localhost:3005/payments/intent Payment->>Payment: Extract userId from JWT Payment->>PG: Verify booking exists
SELECT * FROM bookings
WHERE id = bookingId AND userId = userId alt Booking Non Trouv√© ‚ùå PG-->>Payment: null Payment-->>CN: 404 Not Found
{Infra_EtcdCluster} CN-->>WC: 404 Error WC->>User: ‚ùå Erreur r√©servation else Booking Trouv√© ‚úÖ PG-->>Payment: Booking found Payment->>Stripe: Create PaymentIntent
POST /v1/payment_intents
{Infra_EtcdCluster),
currency: "eur",
metadata: {Infra_IngressController}} Stripe-->>Payment: PaymentIntent created
{Infra_LoadBalancer} Payment->>PG: INSERT payment
{Infra_IngressController} Payment->>Kafka: Publish event
Topic: "payment.intent.created"
{Infra_IngressController} Payment-->>CN: 200 OK
{Infra_EtcdCluster} CN-->>WC: 200 OK end end rect rgb(Infra_RedisCache) Note over WC,Stripe: Phase 4: Paiement Stripe (Infra_WorkerNode) WC->>WC: Initialize Stripe.js
with clientSecret WC->>User: Affiche formulaire carte
(Infra_EtcdCluster) User->>WC: Saisit infos carte
(Infra_RedisCache) WC->>Stripe: POST /v1/payment_intents/:id/confirm
(Infra_IngressController)

- Carte jamais envoy√©e √† notre backend
- Stripe g√®re tout
- Tokenization automatique alt Paiement R√©ussi ‚úÖ Stripe-->>WC: PaymentIntent succeeded WC->>WC: Display success message WC->>User: ‚úÖ Paiement accept√© else Paiement √âchou√© ‚ùå Stripe-->>WC: PaymentIntent failed
(Infra_RedisCache) WC->>User: ‚ùå "Paiement refus√©"
(Infra_LoadBalancer) end end rect rgb(Infra_IngressController) Note over Stripe,Kafka: Phase 5: Webhook Stripe (Infra_IngressController) Stripe->>Payment: POST /webhooks/stripe
Stripe-Signature header
{Infra_IngressController}} Payment->>Payment: Verify signature
stripe.webhooks.constructEvent(Infra_RedisCache) alt Signature Invalide ‚ùå Payment-->>Stripe: 400 Bad Request Note right of Payment: Protection contre
webhooks forg√©s else Signature Valide ‚úÖ Payment->>PG: UPDATE payment
SET status = "SUCCEEDED"
WHERE stripePaymentIntentId = id Payment->>PG: UPDATE booking
SET status = "CONFIRMED"
WHERE id = bookingId Payment->>Redis: Delete temp booking
DEL "booking:temp:bookingId" Payment->>Kafka: Publish event
Topic: "payment.succeeded"
{Infra_IngressController} Payment-->>Stripe: 200 OK end end rect rgb(Infra_EtcdCluster) Note over Kafka,User: Phase 6: Traitement Async (Infra_IngressController) Kafka->>Voyage: Consume event
"payment.succeeded" Voyage->>PG: SELECT booking details Voyage->>Voyage: Generate confirmation email
(Infra_LoadBalancer) Voyage->>User: üìß Email confirmation
+ PDF billet Kafka->>AI: Consume event
"voyage.booking.created" AI->>PG: Get user profile
+ booking history AI->>AI: Update ML model
(Infra_EtcdCluster) Note right of AI: ü§ñ AI learning
from user behavior AI->>Redis: Update recommendations
key: "reco:userId" end rect rgb(Infra_RedisCache) Note over WC,User: Phase 7: Confirmation Frontend loop Polling every 2s WC->>CN: GET /api/v1/bookings/:bookingId CN->>Voyage: Forward request Voyage->>PG: SELECT booking
WHERE id = bookingId alt Status = CONFIRMED ‚úÖ PG-->>Voyage: Booking confirmed Voyage-->>CN: 200 OK
{Infra_WorkerNode} CN-->>WC: 200 OK WC->>WC: Stop polling WC->>WC: Redirect /bookings/:id WC->>User: ‚úÖ Affiche confirmation
+ d√©tails voyage else Status = PENDING ‚è≥ PG-->>Voyage: Booking still pending Voyage-->>CN: 200 OK
{Infra_RedisCache} CN-->>WC: 200 OK (Infra_LoadBalancer) Note right of WC: ‚è±Ô∏è Apr√®s 15min
r√©servation annul√©e
automatiquement end end end Note over User,Kafka: üìä Performance R√©servation
Create booking: ~100-150ms
Payment intent: ~500-800ms (Infra_EtcdCluster)
Confirmation: ~1-2s (Infra_WorkerNode)
Email: ~3-5s (Infra_IngressController)
